name: Edicion Limitada 2024 Cabildos
additionalNotes:
Standard band B, with an Limited Edition 2024 band, and a Trinidad 55 Anniversary footband. Premier edition have a special Premier version of the Limited Edition band..
Numbered luxury bo√Æte nature box of 5 cigars (10,000 produced).
Luxury slide lid box of 12 cigars.
A 2024 release.
History:
First announced to distributors for 2022 but was postponed and not announced to the public until the 2024 programme. 10,000 leather wrapped luxury boxes of 5 released in June 2024 with Premier Edition branding, exclusive to the UK. Standard packaging will follow sometime later. Both the boxes and the footband of each cigar contain an NFC authentication chip.
